author: Roman Silin
description: Kinematic character controller for 3D games. Tweakable, smooth and functional.
name: Kinematic Walker

releases.message:
### Fixed

- Changed the message id from `contact_point` to `contact_point_info` to avoid conflicts with Defold 1.6.4.

### Fixed

- https://github.com/astrochili/defold-kinematic-walker/issues/14 Fixed the camera rotation following with a frame lag.

### Added

- Caching hash values.

- https://github.com/astrochili/defold-kinematic-walker/issues/8 Now it uses [`fixed_update()`](https://github.com/astrochili/defold-kinematic-walker#quick-start) and has separated physics body. 
- Added the [`teleport`](https://github.com/astrochili/defold-kinematic-walker#teleport) message handling because now it's not possible to change the player position with `go.set_position()`
- Moved capsule player example to the extension as the [`dummy.collection`](https://github.com/astrochili/defold-kinematic-walker#quick-start) to quickly place it on the scene and enjoy.
- https://github.com/astrochili/defold-kinematic-walker/issues/9 Fixed `trigger_response` message forwarding.
- https://github.com/astrochili/defold-kinematic-walker/issues/4 Added level dropout trigger to the example.
- Fixed the ability to external updating the position of the game object (teleporting, restarting).

- Fixed the assertion when the `collision_crouching` or `eyes` urls don't exist.
- Removed `walker_collision_group` and `world_collision_group` properties. Now the walker collision group is detected automatically, the world collision group is provided with `collision_mask` message to support multiple masks.
- Added the `collision_mask` message to notify the walker about the collision mask with array of collision groups.
- Added the `eyes_switching` toggle.
- Renamed the `eyes_position_url` to `eyes`.
- Changed a default value of `is_crouching_allowed` to `false`.
